Select the format of the input values to: Select the format of the input values to be added into the worksheet.
Enable this option to replace all existi: Enable this option to replace all existing data in the sheet with new data from your input. This will clear any extra rows beyond the updated range.
Enable this option to check for duplicat: Enable this option to check for duplicate values before inserting data into the sheet. Only unique rows will be added based on the selected column.
The column to check for duplicate values: The column to check for duplicate values.

Enter the row number where your column h: Enter the row number where your column headers are located (usually row 1).

\n**Notes:**\n\n- Memory key is used to:
**Notes:**

- Memory key is used to remember where last row was processed and will be used in the following runs.
- Republishing the flow **keeps** the memory key value, If you want to start over **change** the memory key.
The key used to store the current row nu: The key used to store the current row number in memory
The number of rows to get: The number of rows to get
Enter the name of the spreadsheet to sea: Enter the name of the spreadsheet to search for
If true, only return spreadsheets that e: If true, only return spreadsheets that exactly match the name. If false, return spreadsheets that contain the name.
If true, only return worksheets that exa: If true, only return worksheets that exactly match the name. If false, return worksheets that contain the name.
The column index starts from 1.For examp: The column index starts from 1.For example, if you want to add a column to the third column, enter 3.Ff the input is less than 1 the column will be added after the last current column.
Select the file type to export the sheet: Select the file type to export the sheet as.
Return the exported data as text instead: Return the exported data as text instead of a file.
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.

Please note that there might be a delay: Please note that there might be a delay of up to 3 minutes for the trigger to be fired, due to a delay from Google.
Trigger on changes to cells in this colu:
Trigger on changes to cells in this column only. 
Select **Any Column** if you want the flow to trigger on changes to any cell within the row.
